July 5, 1947 D Louth Contest
Louth Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
louth-contest
None
Wayside Scenes
Louth, Lincolnshire, England, UK March contest 1st Brodsworth, 2nd Scunthorpe B.L., 3rd Thorne Colliery, 4th Waltham B.L. Prizes - 1st £15 and shield, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £6. Organised by Louth British Legion. 16 bands competed.
Feb. 8, 2013, 12:11 p.m. Feb. 15, 2019, 11:19 a.m.
1 Brodsworth Colliery Band Unknown
2 Appleby Frodingham Works Unknown
3 Barton Town Band William Richards
4 Thorne Colliery Thomas Richards
5 Scunthorpe Borough British Legion William Richards
Unknown Result Lincoln Excelsior Band Unknown
Unknown Result Waltham British Legion Unknown
